sentences.sentence: It is our collective duty in this age to throw off such idiocy, and work honorably toward our intent.
sentences.translation: 在这个时代，我们的集体责任是摆脱这种愚蠢行为，并光荣地朝着我们的目标努力。

sentences.sentence: My opponent, Senator McCain, has served his country honorably.
sentences.translation: Corbis我的竞选对手麦凯恩参议员为美国作出的贡献令人尊敬。

sentences.sentence: And to creatively, brilliantly, and honorably serve the highest good of all.
sentences.translation: 创造性地、辉煌的、体面地为人们服务。
